name: Gaikokujin No Sensei (Foreigner Teacher) Visual Novel
name_original: Gaikokujin No Sensei (Foreigner Teacher) Visual Novel
description:
This is a demo for the upcoming Visual novel "Gaikokujin No Sensei" (Foreigner Teacher) 

The game has been in production for over a year now, with many lines recorded, art completed, and the basic story and programming being completed. The game will contain

- 200k+ words 

- 40+ beautiful CG's

- 4+ romance routes each with their own ending

- FULLY VOICE ACTED. No stretch goals, no "partial" voice acting, this game is fully voiced from the word "Go" (The only exception being the protagonist who is silent for that immersive feel)

- Original soundtrack

- Nameable Protagonist

Story

The Main character is a man in his mid-30's. Got fired recently, has no money, no girlfriend, no prospects. That is until he comes across a woman looking for people to work abroad in Japan. The only problem? He doesn't know a single thing about Japan, whether it be the culture or the language.

Still, with all other options gone, he finds himself taking the job and ends up on the other side of the world with no idea what he's doing. To make matters worse, Shortly after arriving, he comes across two eccentric spirits with which he's now stuck for the next year. 

There's one thing he can say for certain, this year certainly isn't going to be boring.

This is just the free demo and it runs about 15-20 minutes. The music during the game is just a place holder and the font/title screen choices will be upgraded at a later date.
